entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
